tool_description: Creates conditional logic and branching for survey questions, enabling skip patterns, follow-up questions, and personalized survey paths based on previous responses.

base_questions.description: List of question identifiers to apply logic to

logic_type.description: Type of logic: skip_pattern, follow_up, conditional_display, or branching

action_questions.description: Questions to show/hide/skip based on conditions

logic_operator.description: Logical operator for multiple conditions: AND or OR

default_action.description: Default action when conditions are not met: continue, skip, or end

error_messages: Invalid logic type: Use one of [skip_pattern, follow_up, conditional_display, branching].
Invalid logic operator: Use either AND or OR.
Invalid default action: Use one of [continue, skip, end].
Empty question arrays: base_questions and action_questions cannot be empty.
Invalid trigger conditions: Conditions must be properly formatted (e.g., 'rating_less_than_3').
Question reference error: All question identifiers must be valid strings.
usage: Provide base_questions, logic_type, trigger_conditions, and action_questions. Optionally set logic_operator and default_action. The tool creates conditional logic rules for survey flow control.

logic_rules.description: Generated logic rules in structured format

affected_questions.description: Number of questions affected by the logic

complexity_score.description: Complexity rating of the logic structure (1-10)

validation_status.description: Status of logic validation (valid, warning, error)
